goals__remit:
Ovidius University of Constanta is a public, fully accredited higher education institution, which was founded in 1961 and became a comprehensive, multicultural university in 1990.   The university offers bachelor’s, master’s and doctoral degrees in various fields of study, including medicine and pharmacy, life and environmental sciences, natural sciences and engineering, social sciences and business administration, humanities, theology and arts.  With about 15000 students and over 1000 staff, the university is the largest higher education institution in the EU on the Black Sea coast. 
 
The mission of Ovidius University of Constanța is to create, maintain and disseminate knowledge to society through education, scientific research and artistic creation at European standards.  The university is actively engaged in the community, but with an impact on the entire Black Sea region, Europe and beyond.
